replies.author: 恋
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 HTL9257 于 2019-6-26 20:08 编辑 
message        nucleus.helpop.base        USER        允许执行/helpop命令
nucleus.helpop.base 权限节点  
如果是原版help的话 应该是minecraft.help 

当然其他单独插件的help指令得看各个插件

replies.author: Dirito
replies.txt_content:
海绵端应该是essx是基础插件，/mangaddi default builder把builder组权限给default
默认builder有全部基础权限但是default是玩家默认权限

replies.author: ZXYLOVE
replies.txt_content:
灯芯草 发表于 2019-6-26 19:50
海绵端应该是essx是基础插件，/mangaddi default builder把builder组权限给default
默认builder有全部基础 ...
基础插件不是essx是Nucleus

replies.author: Dirito
replies.txt_content:
ZXYLOVE 发表于 2019-6-26 19:53
基础插件不是essx是Nucleus
/nucleus setupperms user default
应该就可以了

replies.author: ZXYLOVE
replies.txt_content: 我设置好了是用的是luckperms权限的插件指令是/lp group default permission set sponge.command.help
